name: Machinism
description:
Made for Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022!
The theme was: Death is only the beginning! 

Survive as long as you can! Destroy the aproaching enemy ships and avoid the falling meteors! Each time you die you can upgrade some stuff but only one at a time...

  • LMB to shoot
  • Left Shift to use the breaks
  • Tab to pause the game
